title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Hassle-free multicloud connectivity with AWS Interconnect - Multicloud (NET205)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Interconnect 实现无忧多云连接 - 多云 (NET205)
abstract: Many organizations choose AWS as their primary cloud, building their core network, security, and operations around it—while still needing to connect to other Cloud Service Providers (CSPs). In this session, discover AWS Direct Connect Multicloud Connectivity, a new capability that lets you leverage AWS as your unified control point for cross-cloud connectivity. Learn to extend AWS Transit Gateway and AWS Cloud WAN across clouds using managed Direct Connect connections, without relying on third-party providers or physical presence in colocation facilities. We'll showcase reference architectures for multicloud inspection, shared services, and routing policy enforcement.
abstract_cn: 许多组织选择AWS作为其主要云平台,围绕它构建核心网络、安全和运营体系,同时仍需连接到其他云服务提供商(CSP)。在本次会议中,了解AWS Direct Connect多云连接功能,这是一项新功能,让您能够利用AWS作为跨云连接的统一控制点。学习如何使用托管Direct Connect连接跨云扩展AWS Transit Gateway和AWS Cloud WAN,无需依赖第三方提供商或在托管设施中实际部署。我们将展示多云检查、共享服务和路由策略实施的参考架构。
